author: Zack Budryk
title: Idaho's Republican governor extends stay-at-home order despite GOP criticism
description: Idaho Gov. Brad Little (R) has extended stay-at-home orders within the state through April 30 due to the coronavirus pandemic, despite increased protests popping up around the country against the continuing measures, sayi...
content: Idaho Gov. Brad Little (R) has extended stay-at-home orders within the state through April 30 due to the coronavirus pandemic, despite increased protests popping up around the country against the continuing measures, saying, "I've got to do what I've got to d… [+1697 chars]
